Description:
Where Style Meets Convenience
High in style yet low in maintenance, enjoy the full benefits of a modern Clayton South lifestyle with this excellent three-bedroom Townhouse thats central to it all!
For the homebuyer placing a premium on convenience, the walking distance proximity to Westall Secondary College, Westall train station, bus services, parklands and local shops is sure to please. The impressive design and modern character of this appealing residence is therefore the perfect accompaniment to this coveted neighbourhood, offering stunning open-plan living, downstairs accommodation for downsizers and quality appointments that will be appreciated by all.
Feature island bench topped with stone accentuates the functionality of the modern kitchen, which also benefits from easy-to-clean splashback, stainless steel appliances and sleek cabinetry. The seamless integration between the radiant open-plan living and low maintenance courtyard is also perfect during those summertime gatherings.
The close proximity of the downstairs bathroom and main bedroom (with walk-in robes) offers practicality for downsizers, while two additional bedrooms and a large bathroom (floating vanity, frameless shower and bath) are zoned in privacy upstairs.
Bathed in natural light, this standout home also features gas ducted heating, quality tiled flooring, carpeted bedrooms, shed and double carport.
